item.title: AWS CDK(v2): Build AWSBatch environment for FARGATE_SPOT
item.description: We will use AWS CDK v2 to build an AWSBatch environment for FARGATE_SPOT. To create an AWSBatch environment, we first create a VPC ComputeEnvironment JobQueue for each task you want to run, and a JobDefinition for each task you want to execute. I was not very familiar with this configuration and stumbled a lot, so it took me about a day the first time I made it… Well, maybe next time I can do it in an hour or so.
